items.abstract: Noble metal nanoparticles capped with novel aminothioalkil ligands are used to fabricate polymer nanocomposites. The nanoparticles are permanently attached to the polymer matrix through covalent bonding.
title: Fabrication of nanocomposites by covalent bonding between noble metal nanoparticles and polymer matrix
